comment.content: Long scenes,long dialogues which don't add anything to the plot, overrated.Can't remember the film clearly 2 days later and that says a lot.
static and sudden; it's Quentin's manifesto: a masterpiece doesn't need "extraordinary" ideologies, it just needs extraordinary movie making
